name: Board Runner!
description:
Welcome to Board Runner! In this game, you will need to adventure your way through, in getting the Master the 5 special cards he needs.  With this, you will need to fight, battle, and explore your way in the game to obtain these.  As you play, the difficulty of the game will slightly increase with each mission. Good luck!

This game is based on the previous project completed, (Tabletop Game Prototype) and is using the principles, narrative, and ideas from that game to create this game. 

This project is created for a course, DATT 2300.
